oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Saber
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Saber of William Bowen Campbell. U. S. Model 1840 light artillery saber made by Cabbotville Manufacturer in Massachusetts. Saber features standard U. S. stamp and inspector's mark and was used during Mexican War and Civil War.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
